loaderProps.description: Props passed down to Loader component
loaderProps.description_zh: 向下传递给 Loader 组件的 props

overlayProps.description: Props passed down to Overlay component
overlayProps.description_zh: 传递给 Overlay 组件的 props

transitionProps.description: Props passed down to Transition component, { transition: 'fade', duration: 0 } by default
transitionProps.description_zh: 默认传递给 Transition 组件的 props，{ transition： 'fade'， duration： 0 }

visible.description: Determines whether the overlay should be visible, false by default
visible.description_zh: 确定叠加层是否应可见，默认为 false

zIndex.description_zh: 控制叠加层 z-index，默认为 400
